attributes.action: Make Oakwood Homeloans pass on the interest rate cut
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oakwood homeloans need to pass the interest rate cuts onto their customers.  Most customers are only with that company out of desperation due to their poor credit rate. It is these customers that are struggeling the most to make repayments - RATE CUTS SHOULD BE PASSED ON
